name: Cross Point
description:
Three adorable little friends decide to watch the sunset from the best spot possible - the last ravine. 

Pick your character and help them build bridges so that they can enjoy this amazing natural phenomenon.

We advise fullscreen for a better experience.

Controls:

Space- Place Block
R  - Restart Level

Esc - Open Pause Menu

Warning:  This games works on the following browsers: Google Chrome and FireFox
                       May not work on other browsers.

Built in Unity.

A game developed by a GameDevTecnico team for the Wowie Jam 3.0. 

Programming: Fábio Sousa; Samuel Barata; Francisco Costa

Visuals: Renata Candeias; Daniela Machado 

Voice Acting: Daniela Machado 

Text fonts: Vernon Adams; Yvonne Schüttler

Background music: Benjamin Tissot; Pedro J. Costa
